Package ed.adria

Class Calculadora

java.lang.Object
ed.adria.Calculadora
public class Calculadora extends Object
This class groups various methods corresponding a simple calculator

This class is a part of the project "Calculadora" which is indeed a simple calculator with the basic operations such as:

  • Addition (+)
  • Substraction (-)
  • Multiplication (*)
  • Division (/)
  • Modulus (%)
  • Power (^)
Since:
1.5, %G%

      public boolean oper2​(int number)
      This method calculates the remainder of the first number divided by the second number
      Parameters:
      number - Integer that will be check if is pair
      Returns:
      boolean True if the number is pair, and false if it is not Returns true if the number is pair and false if it is not
